label: Resume Screening & Matching Agent
description: ML-based resume parsing and semantic matching against job requirements with bias detection, ranking algorithms, and skills extraction.
capabilities: Parse resumes and extract skills, experience, education
Semantic matching of candidates against job requirements
Detect and mitigate bias in screening process
Rank candidates considering skills, experience, and culture fit
Learn from hiring outcomes to improve matching accuracy

label: Interview Scheduling & Coordination Agent
description: Automated interview scheduling with calendar integration, room booking, video link generation, panel coordination, and intelligent rescheduling.
capabilities: Integrate with calendars (Outlook, Google Calendar) for availability
Book conference rooms and generate video meeting links
Coordinate interview panels across multiple time zones
Send automated reminders to interviewers and candidates
Handle rescheduling requests with minimal manual intervention
dataSources: Time zone data for distributed teams

label: Candidate Experience Agent
description: Personalized candidate communication throughout hiring process with progress updates, FAQ chatbot, feedback collection, and sentiment analysis.
capabilities: Send personalized status updates via email and SMS
Provide FAQ chatbot for common candidate questions
Collect feedback at each hiring stage
Analyze candidate sentiment and identify improvement areas
Personalize communication based on candidate profile and preferences

label: Diversity & Inclusion Agent
description: Tracks diversity metrics throughout hiring funnel, flags potential bias in job descriptions, ensures diverse interview panels, and reports on hiring outcomes.
capabilities: Track diversity metrics at each hiring stage
Analyze job descriptions for inclusive language
Ensure diverse representation on interview panels
Identify bias patterns in screening and selection
Generate diversity reports and goal tracking dashboards
dataSources: Hiring funnel conversion rates by demographic

label: Reference & Background Check Agent
description: Automated reference request workflows, background check vendor integration, compliance verification (I-9, right-to-work), and red flag detection.
capabilities: Send automated reference requests and follow-ups
Integrate with background check vendors (Sterling, HireRight)
Verify I-9 compliance and right-to-work documentation
Detect red flags and escalate to HR for review
Track completion status and deadline adherence

label: IT Provisioning & Access Agent
description: Automated IT account creation, system provisioning, equipment ordering, and role-based access configuration for new hires.
capabilities: Auto-create Active Directory accounts and email
Provision SSO access to business applications
Order laptops, phones, and monitors from IT vendors
Configure role-based access based on job function
Integrate with IT service management for ticket tracking
integrations: Identity Management (Active Directory, Okta, Azure AD)
dataSources: New hire data (name, role, department, start date)
Role-based access matrix by job function

label: Benefits Enrollment Agent
description: Personalized benefits recommendations, chatbot Q&A, plan comparison tools, enrollment deadline reminders, and validation for new hires and life events.
capabilities: Provide personalized benefits recommendations based on demographics
Offer 24/7 chatbot for benefits questions
Compare plans side-by-side with cost estimates
Send enrollment deadline reminders and alerts
Validate dependent eligibility and enrollment accuracy
dataSources: Enrollment deadlines and life event triggers

label: Personalized Training Agent
description: Role-based training curriculum, learning path recommendations, auto-enrollment in required courses, progress tracking, and manager visibility.
capabilities: Generate role-based training curriculum and learning paths
Recommend courses based on skills gaps and career goals
Auto-enroll employees in required compliance and onboarding training
Track progress and send intelligent reminders
Provide managers visibility into team training completion
integrations: HRIS for role and employee data
dataSources: Training curriculum by role and level

label: Manager Enablement Agent
description: Manager onboarding checklists, new hire progress dashboards, suggested 1:1 topics, performance coaching resources, and escalation triggers.
capabilities: Provide manager onboarding checklists and best practices
Show new hire progress dashboards with completion status
Suggest 1:1 meeting topics based on new hire stage
Offer performance coaching resources and templates
Trigger escalations for low engagement or missed milestones
integrations: HRIS for employee and manager data
Learning Management System for manager training

label: Access Governance Agent
description: Immediate revocation of critical access, staged access removal, compliance reporting (SOX, GDPR), and complete audit trail of access changes.
capabilities: Immediately revoke critical access (VPN, production systems) on resignation
Stage access revocation (email retained 30 days, file access 90 days)
Generate compliance reports for SOX and GDPR audits
Maintain complete audit trail of all access changes
Integrate with identity management for automated deprovisioning
dataSources: Access retention policies by system type

label: Skills Assessment & Gap Analysis Agent
description: Integrates with performance reviews, analyzes job postings for emerging skills, compares employee skills vs role requirements, identifies enterprise-wide skill gaps.
capabilities: Assess employee skills from performance reviews and 360 feedback
Analyze job postings to identify emerging skill requirements
Compare employee skills against current role requirements
Identify enterprise-wide skill gaps by department and role
Recommend build vs buy strategies for skill acquisition
integrations: Job Board APIs for market skill trends
dataSources: Market skill trends from job postings

label: Personalized Learning Recommendation Agent
description: ML-based content recommendations considering learning style, career goals, time availability, microlearning for busy employees, and peer learning matching.
capabilities: Recommend content using ML based on skills gaps and career goals
Consider learning style preferences and time availability
Suggest microlearning modules (5-10 minutes) for busy schedules
Match employees with peers for mentorship and learning
Personalize learning paths for career progression
dataSources: Learning style preferences and engagement data

label: Content Curation & Delivery Agent
description: Aggregates content from multiple sources (LinkedIn Learning, Coursera, Udemy), manages in-house content, delivers via mobile, and supports gamification.
capabilities: Aggregate learning content from multiple external providers
Manage and curate in-house training content library
Deliver mobile-friendly content for on-the-go learning
Implement gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, points)
Support social learning and peer collaboration
integrations: Content Provider APIs (LinkedIn Learning, Coursera, Udemy)

label: Compliance Training Agent
description: Auto-enrollment in required training (harassment, security, safety), deadline tracking and escalation, manager notifications, and audit reporting.
capabilities: Auto-enroll employees in required compliance training by role
Track completion deadlines and send reminders
Escalate overdue training to managers and HR
Generate compliance audit reports by requirement
Support multi-language training for global workforce
dataSources: Compliance training requirements by role and location

label: Learning Impact Measurement Agent
description: Correlates training with performance improvement, tracks promotion rates for learners vs non-learners, analyzes retention and engagement, calculates training ROI.
capabilities: Correlate training completion with performance rating improvements
Track promotion rates comparing learners vs non-learners
Analyze retention differences between engaged and non-engaged learners
Calculate training ROI (investment vs business outcomes)
Identify most effective learning programs and content
integrations: HRIS for promotion and retention data
Financial Systems for training investment tracking

label: Continuous Feedback & Recognition Agent
description: Prompts for timely feedback after projects, Slack/Teams integration for quick feedback, peer recognition and kudos, real-time feedback aggregation.
capabilities: Prompt managers for feedback after projects and presentations
Enable quick feedback via Slack/Teams integration
Support peer-to-peer recognition and kudos
Aggregate real-time feedback throughout year (no annual surprise)
Analyze feedback themes and sentiment
integrations: HRIS for employee and manager data
dataSources: Feedback and recognition submitted by managers and peers

label: Goal Setting & Tracking Agent
description: OKR/KPI goal management, weekly progress check-ins, red/yellow/green status alerts, goal alignment across org hierarchy.
capabilities: Manage OKR and KPI goal setting and updates
Facilitate weekly progress check-ins and status updates
Provide red/yellow/green status alerts for at-risk goals
Align goals across organizational hierarchy (cascade and rollup)
Recommend corrective actions for off-track goals

label: 360 Feedback Orchestration Agent
description: Automated 360 review cycles (quarterly or biannual), peer nomination and selection, anonymous feedback collection, thematic analysis.
capabilities: Automate 360 feedback cycles on quarterly or biannual schedule
Manage peer nomination and selection process
Collect anonymous feedback from multiple sources
Perform thematic analysis of qualitative feedback
Generate individual and team 360 reports
integrations: HRIS for employee and org data
dataSources: 360 feedback responses (manager, peer, direct report, self)

label: Performance Analytics & Insights Agent
description: Identifies high performers (promotion candidates), flags low performers (PIP risk), predicts attrition risk, analyzes diversity in ratings fairness.
capabilities: Identify high performers as promotion candidates
Flag low performers at risk for performance improvement plans
Predict attrition risk based on engagement and performance data
Analyze rating fairness across demographics (diversity equity)
Generate actionable insights for talent decisions
dataSources: Engagement survey data and pulse results

label: Development & Career Planning Agent
description: Generates development plans from feedback, suggests stretch assignments, identifies mentorship opportunities, tracks career progression.
capabilities: Generate personalized development plans from performance feedback
Suggest stretch assignments and project opportunities
Identify mentorship matches based on skills and goals
Track career progression and readiness for next level
Recommend training and experiences for career advancement
integrations: HRIS for career history and succession data

label: Market Intelligence & Benchmarking Agent
description: Integrates with salary survey providers (Radford, Mercer, Payscale), provides real-time market data by role, location, industry, identifies below-market employees.
capabilities: Integrate with salary survey providers for market data
Provide real-time market pay ranges by role, location, industry
Identify below-market employees at retention risk
Analyze competitive positioning for offers and adjustments
Forecast market trends and recommend proactive adjustments
integrations: Market Data Providers (Payscale, Salary.com, Radford, Mercer)
dataSources: Market salary data by role, location, industry
Attrition data for retention risk analysis

label: Pay Equity & Compliance Agent
description: Regression analysis for pay gaps, flags statistically significant disparities, FLSA classification compliance (exempt vs non-exempt), EEO-1 reporting automation.
capabilities: Perform regression analysis to identify pay gaps by demographics
Flag statistically significant pay disparities requiring investigation
Ensure FLSA classification compliance (exempt vs non-exempt)
Automate EEO-1 reporting with accurate demographic data
Monitor state and local pay equity law compliance
dataSources: Pay equity law requirements by jurisdiction

label: Compensation Planning Agent
description: Manager dashboard with team comp data, promotion and adjustment recommendations, budget tracking and alerts, scenario modeling (what-if analysis).
capabilities: Provide managers with team compensation dashboards
Recommend promotions and salary adjustments based on data
Track budget utilization and send alerts for overages
Enable scenario modeling for what-if compensation analysis
Support merit, bonus, and equity allocation workflows

label: Benefits Selection & Optimization Agent
description: Personalized benefits recommendations, plan comparison and cost calculator, dependent eligibility verification, HSA/FSA contribution optimization.
capabilities: Recommend benefits plans based on employee demographics and needs
Provide side-by-side plan comparison with cost calculators
Verify dependent eligibility and prevent enrollment errors
Optimize HSA/FSA contributions for tax advantages
Predict benefits costs and guide employee decisions

label: Benefits Communication & Engagement Agent
description: Multi-channel benefits education (email, SMS, chatbot), video explainers for complex benefits (HSA vs FSA), open enrollment reminders, total rewards statement generation.
capabilities: Deliver multi-channel benefits education (email, SMS, chatbot)
Provide video explainers for complex benefits concepts
Send open enrollment reminders and deadline alerts
Generate personalized total rewards statements
Measure benefits communication effectiveness
dataSources: Total compensation data (salary, bonus, benefits value)

label: Intelligent Time Capture Agent
description: Biometric time clocks (facial recognition, fingerprint), mobile geofencing for field workers, auto-punch based on computer login, exception detection.
capabilities: Capture time via biometric clocks (eliminates buddy punching)
Support mobile geofencing for field worker time tracking
Auto-punch time based on computer login for office workers
Detect exceptions (missed punch, unusual hours, location anomalies)
Ensure accurate time data flows to payroll

label: Overtime Management & Compliance Agent
description: Real-time overtime alerts (approaching 40 hours), manager approval for overtime before incurred, FLSA compliance (meal breaks, rest periods), state-specific labor law rules.
capabilities: Send real-time alerts when employees approach 40-hour threshold
Require manager approval before overtime is incurred
Ensure FLSA compliance with meal breaks and rest periods
Apply state-specific labor law rules (CA, NY, etc.)
Generate compliance reports for audit and legal review
dataSources: Employee time punch data and schedules
State and federal labor law requirements
Meal break and rest period compliance data

label: PTO & Leave Management Agent
description: Self-service PTO requests via mobile, auto-approval based on rules (blackout dates, coverage), PTO accrual calculations, FMLA and leave of absence tracking.
capabilities: Enable self-service PTO requests via mobile and web
Auto-approve requests based on business rules (coverage, blackouts)
Calculate PTO accruals based on tenure and policy
Track FMLA and leave of absence requests with compliance
Provide real-time PTO balance visibility to employees
integrations: HRIS for PTO policies and balances
Leave Management and FMLA Tracking Tools
dataSources: Employee PTO balances and accrual rates
State and federal leave law requirements

label: Workforce Scheduling Agent
description: Shift scheduling based on demand forecasts, employee preference consideration, swap and coverage management, shift compliance (minimum rest between shifts).
capabilities: Generate shift schedules based on demand forecasts
Consider employee availability and shift preferences
Enable shift swaps and coverage requests with approval
Ensure compliance with minimum rest between shifts
Optimize labor costs while meeting service level requirements
dataSources: Shift compliance rules (rest periods, consecutive days)

label: Labor Analytics & Forecasting Agent
description: Real-time labor cost dashboard, forecasts labor needs based on sales/demand, identifies labor inefficiencies, benchmarks across locations.
capabilities: Provide real-time labor cost dashboards by location and department
Forecast future labor needs based on demand and growth plans
Identify labor inefficiencies (overstaffing, high overtime)
Benchmark labor productivity across locations
Recommend labor optimization strategies

label: Demand Forecasting & Capacity Planning Agent
description: Predicts headcount needs based on revenue/growth plans, identifies capacity constraints by department/role, recommends hiring priorities, integrates with financial planning.
capabilities: Predict future headcount needs based on business growth plans
Identify capacity constraints by department and role
Recommend hiring priorities and sequencing
Integrate with financial planning (FP&A) for budget alignment
Model workforce scenarios for different growth trajectories
integrations: Applicant Tracking System for pipeline visibility

label: Attrition Prediction & Retention Agent
description: ML model predicts attrition risk by employee, identifies factors (compensation, manager, tenure, engagement), triggers retention interventions, calculates cost of attrition.
capabilities: Predict attrition risk for each employee using ML models
Identify attrition factors (pay, manager, engagement, tenure)
Trigger retention interventions (stay conversations, adjustments)
Calculate cost of attrition and replacement
Track retention intervention effectiveness

label: Skills & Competency Analytics Agent
description: Maps current skills across workforce, identifies future skills needed (strategic initiatives), pinpoints skill gaps (build vs buy analysis), recommends reskilling vs hiring.
capabilities: Map current skills across entire workforce
Identify future skills needed for strategic initiatives
Pinpoint skill gaps with build vs buy analysis
Recommend reskilling programs vs external hiring
Track skills development progress over time
integrations: Job Board APIs for market skill trends
dataSources: Market skill trends and emerging technologies

label: Succession & Talent Mobility Agent
description: Identifies high-potential employees, creates succession plans for critical roles, tracks internal mobility (promotions, lateral moves), recommends stretch assignments.
capabilities: Identify high-potential employees for leadership development
Create succession plans for critical roles with readiness assessment
Track internal mobility patterns (promotions, lateral moves)
Recommend stretch assignments for development
Monitor succession bench strength and gaps

label: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Agent
description: Tracks representation across levels, departments, identifies promotion equity gaps, pay equity analysis integration, forecasts diversity outcomes under current trends.
capabilities: Track diversity representation across all levels and departments
Identify promotion equity gaps by demographic groups
Integrate pay equity analysis for compensation fairness
Forecast diversity outcomes under current hiring and promotion trends
Recommend interventions to achieve diversity goals
integrations: Applicant Tracking System for hiring funnel data
dataSources: Representation by level, department, and role
Promotion and hiring rates by demographic

label: Pulse Survey & Feedback Agent
description: Weekly/biweekly pulse surveys (3-5 questions), question rotation (avoid fatigue), anonymous feedback channel, team-level and manager-level insights, trend analysis.
capabilities: Deliver weekly or biweekly pulse surveys with 3-5 rotating questions
Provide anonymous feedback channel for employee concerns
Generate team-level and manager-level engagement insights
Analyze engagement trends and trajectory over time
Benchmark engagement across teams and departments
integrations: HRIS for employee and org data
dataSources: Pulse survey responses and participation rates
Survey question library and rotation schedule

label: Sentiment & Text Analytics Agent
description: NLP analysis of survey comments, sentiment analysis of Slack/Teams messages (opt-in), exit interview theme extraction, identifies emerging issues (pay concerns, workload, culture).
capabilities: Analyze survey comments using NLP for theme extraction
Perform sentiment analysis on Slack/Teams messages (with consent)
Extract themes from exit interview feedback
Identify emerging issues before they become widespread
Track sentiment trends over time and by team

label: Manager Effectiveness Agent
description: Manager scorecards (team engagement, attrition, performance), identifies high-performing and struggling managers, recommends manager coaching, tracks manager development over time.
capabilities: Generate manager scorecards with team health metrics
Identify high-performing and struggling managers
Recommend targeted coaching for manager development
Track manager improvement trends over time
Provide early warning for toxic manager behaviors
integrations: HRIS for org hierarchy and attrition data
Learning Management System for manager training

label: Employee Relations Case Management Agent
description: Centralized case intake (harassment, discrimination, grievances), case routing and assignment, investigation workflow and deadlines, compliance reporting (EEOC, state agencies), audit trail.
capabilities: Centralize intake for all ER cases (harassment, discrimination, grievances)
Route cases to appropriate investigators based on type and severity
Manage investigation workflows with deadline tracking
Generate compliance reports for EEOC and state agencies
Maintain complete audit trail for legal defense
dataSources: ER case intake data (type, severity, parties involved)
EEOC and state agency reporting requirements

label: Crisis Detection & Intervention Agent
description: Flags concerning language (suicide, violence, extreme distress), immediate escalation to HR + security, Employee Assistance Program (EAP) referrals, follow-up and case closure.
capabilities: Detect concerning language indicating crisis (suicide, violence, distress)
Immediately escalate to HR, security, and crisis response team
Facilitate EAP referrals and mental health support
Track follow-up and case closure with care
Maintain confidentiality while ensuring employee safety

label: Compliance Calendar & Tracking Agent
description: Centralized compliance calendar (all requirements), auto-reminders for upcoming deadlines, status tracking (compliant, at-risk, overdue), executive dashboard (compliance posture).
capabilities: Maintain centralized compliance calendar for all HR requirements
Send automated reminders for upcoming compliance deadlines
Track status (compliant, at-risk, overdue) for each requirement
Generate executive dashboard showing overall compliance posture
Escalate overdue requirements to HR leadership
integrations: HRIS for employee and organizational data

label: Regulatory Intelligence & Change Management Agent
description: Monitors federal register, state legislation, court rulings, assesses impact on organization (location, industry), recommends policy updates, tracks implementation of changes.
capabilities: Monitor federal register, state legislation, and court rulings
Assess regulatory changes for organizational impact
Recommend policy updates to ensure compliance
Track implementation of policy changes across organization
Provide legal briefings on complex regulatory changes
integrations: Regulatory Intelligence Services (Thomson Reuters, Bloomberg Law)
dataSources: Federal, state, and local regulatory databases

label: Training & Certification Management Agent
description: Auto-enrollment in required training, deadline tracking by employee and requirement, manager escalation for overdue training, compliance reporting (who's certified, who's not).
capabilities: Auto-enroll employees in required compliance training
Track completion deadlines by employee and requirement
Escalate overdue training to managers and HR
Generate compliance reports showing certification status
Support recertification requirements and expiration tracking
integrations: HRIS for employee role and location data

Employee training completion and certification status

label: Audit Management & Documentation Agent
description: Maintains audit trail (all HR actions logged), document repository (policies, training records, complaints), audit request response automation, legal hold and retention policies.
capabilities: Maintain comprehensive audit trail of all HR actions
Manage document repository for policies and records
Automate response to audit requests with instant documentation
Implement legal holds and retention policies
Generate audit reports for internal and external auditors

label: Automated Reporting & Filing Agent
description: EEO-1 report auto-generation, VETS-4212, AAP, OSHA 300 reports, state-specific reports (California, NY, etc.), e-filing integration (EEOC, DOL portals).
capabilities: Auto-generate EEO-1 reports from HRIS demographic data
Create VETS-4212, AAP, and OSHA 300 reports automatically
Generate state-specific compliance reports (CA, NY, etc.)
